textBox.richText: A list of SwA education and training samples from academia and private organizations. Academic Curricula Samples https://buildsecurityin.us-cert.gov/swa/wetwgdocs.html Carnegie Mellon University CS curriculum http://www.csd.cs.cmu.edu/education/bscs/index.html#curriculum George Washington University CS curriculum http://www.cs.ucdavis.edu/courses/exp_course_desc/index.html Massachusetts Institute of Technology EECS Undergraduate Program http://www.eecs.mit.edu/ug/index.html. Master's program in Secure Software Systems at James Madison University http://www.cs.jmu.edu/sss/ Stevens Institute of Technology, Software Assurance Program http://sse.stevens.edu/academics/graduate/software-engineering/program-overview/software-assurance/ Stanford University CS curriculum http://cs.stanford.edu/Courses/. University of California at Davis CS curriculum http://www.cs.ucdavis.edu/courses/exp_course_desc/index.html. Commercial Training Examples Aspect Security, Inc., Application Security Education and Training http://www.aspectsecurity.com/training.htm. EC-Council, Application and Information Security, and Computer Forensic Investigation Training http://www.eccouncil.org EC-Council University Master of Security Science (MSS) http://www.eccuni.us/Academics/MasterofSecurityScience.aspx Foundstone, Inc., Education http://www.foundstone.com/us/education-overview.asp KRvW Associates, LLC., Training Services http://www.krvw.com/training/training.html LogiGear, Inc., Web and Software Application Security Testing http://www.logigear.com/training/course_catalog/course.asp?courseId=20 Microsoft Corp., Clinic 2806: Microsoft® Security Guidance Training for Developers (and other courses) https://www.microsoftelearning.com/eLearning/courseDetail.aspx?courseId=26043. Netcraft, Inc., Web Application Security Course http://audited.netcraft.com/web-application-course Next Generation Security Software, Ltd., Security Training http://www.ngssoftware.com/consulting/training/ SecuRisk Solutions at http://www.securisksolutions.com/index.php/education/training/ Security Innovation, Inc., Application Security Education http://www.securityinnovation.com/services/education/index.shtml The SANS Institute, Inc. https://www.sans.org
